responsibilities: Develop and support big data processing pipelines including ingestion, transformation, and end-customer delivery
Build out cloud-based infrastructure using distributed techniques for data engineers, data scientists, and researchers
Stay at the forefront of new technology developments in big data handling and processing, and conduct proof of concepts evaluations
Build and support visualization and exploration capabilities around big data sets
Provide technical leadership through hands-on development
Have a broad impact on architecture and team processes
Transform large unstructured data sets into valuable investment research inputs
Collaborate with experts inside and outside the firm to understand data needs and offerings
Work as part of a cross-functional team made up of Investment, Research, and Compliance professionals
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on big data processing, cloud-based infrastructure, and data transformation for investment research. There is no mention of language models or tasks related to fine-tuning or customizing them. The responsibilities are more aligned with data engineering and infrastructure rather than language model development.
